name: Defender Tactics
description:
Guide:

-Buy shop units by clicking on the unit and using gold

-You can change the position of your units by clicking and dragging

-Each unit has traits and classes, make the best composition you think possible

-Buying duplicates of a unit will increase its stats at 2 exp and at 8 exp (MAX)

-Press 'E' on a unit to sell it

-Press 'F' to level up your shop and 'D' to refresh it. or click the buttons on the bottom

When you have assembled your team click the done button to proceed to battle

-Click and drag to make a combination of 3 units to attack

-Right click a unit to see their traits, classes and ability

-Units gain mana every turn as well as when they attack

-Hover over a trait/class for further information on the bonuses
